definition: Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang
Helen Keller (1880-1968), famous American deaf-blind author and activist (whose story is told in biopic The Miracle Worker)

sentences.english: Helene, Sorry I only told you half of the story.
sentences.chinese: 海倫抱歉我只告訴了你事情的一半。

sentences.english: The farmland great body didn't move and just seeing at Helen chillily.
sentences.chinese: 田宏的身體沒有動，只是冷冷的看着海倫。

sentences.english: Sad about the move, I bicycled down the hill to Helen's.
sentences.chinese: 因爲要搬走，我很傷心，騎車下山來到海倫家。

sentences.english: Jack will end by marrying Helen.
sentences.chinese: 傑克最終將娶海倫爲妻。

sentences.english: Helen is very good at throwing the javelin and Mary is very good at running.
sentences.chinese: 海倫很擅長標槍，瑪麗則長於跑步。

sentences.english: Helen was in a cold sweat from fear when she sighted the corpse.
sentences.chinese: 海倫看到屍體，嚇出了一身冷汗。

sentences.english: To take Hellon as an example, blindness is sometimes quite an exciting experience.
sentences.chinese: 以海倫來說吧，有時候失明是相當好旳經驗。

sentences.english: On Helen's cheek all art of beauty set.
sentences.chinese: 美容術盡施於海倫臉龐。

sentences.english: Helen is anxious about travelling on her own.
sentences.chinese: 海倫對自己一個人出遠門旅行感到擔心。

sentences.english: It is four years since Hellen became a teacher.
sentences.chinese: 海倫當教師已有四年了。

sentences.english: Jerry wanted to introduce himself to Helen, but he didn't want to come on too strong.
sentences.chinese: 傑瑞想要向海倫自我介紹，但他不想表現得太猴急。

sentences.english: Jack and Helen had dropped behind in order to be alone.
sentences.chinese: 爲了單獨呆在一起，傑克和海倫故意讓別人走在前面。

sentences.english: I made a snake bag out of a pillowcase, as Helen had instructed.
sentences.chinese: 我用枕套做了個蛇袋，就像海倫教我的那樣。

sentences.english: He and Helen celebrated their silver wedding last year.
sentences.chinese: 他和海倫去年慶祝了他們的銀婚。

sentences.english: Helen can also sing Chinese songs.
Helen Keller is a model for you and me.
sentences.chinese: 海倫凱勒是你和我的榜樣。

definition: chief editor (of newspaper)/abbr. for 總編輯|总编辑
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
Heilongjiang Province (Heilungkiang) in northeast China, abbr. 黑, capital Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1]
Michel or Mitchell (name)/George Mitchell (1933-), US Democratic party politician and diplomat, influential in brokering Northern Ireland peace deal in 1990s, US Middle East special envoy from 2009
